name: BackDoor- Door 3
description:
You continue your journey through the empty otherworld, having just completed a job for the mysterious man on the phone.  Unsurprisingly you soon find yourself with a new job, this time in a world of birds and trains.  You follow through with your new task, slowly coming closer to finding the truth around your predicament.

Door 3 is the latest chapter in a series of games I have been working on for some time.  I hope you enjoy it!

Featuring the incredible music talents of AstroKid, PengoSolvent, Jupebox, Catboss, and James Roach!

Controls are listed by mousing over the controller symbol on the top right corner of the game screen. There’s also a volume toggle in the same location, and the controls are configurable from the main menu.

Keep an eye out for hidden secrets and Easter Eggs!

I'll post a walkthrough in a few days.
